title: Mental Health Awareness Training for Probation System Administrators: Culturally Adaptive Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of the Probation System and Management Competencies
context.additional_context: Learners analyze case studies reflecting cultural differences, referencing experiences with European probation system education standards.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze three or more behavioral patterns of probationary individuals with mental health issues and develop management strategies.
Learners can propose two or more culturally contextualized mental health interventions for European countries.
Learners can produce team-based project outputs on digital platforms to suggest mental health awareness improvement plans.

resources: Mental Health Diagnostic Assessment Framework Sample

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
